title: hari hari hari
sahitya:
hari hari hariyembo naraginnEtara bhayavillillallA


caraNam 1    dhruvagolidava shrIshA hussen dhruvapadavittena hussen 
bhAva shuddi iruvallallibhava bhayavembodillallA
    caraNam 2    kari more kELida shrIsha hussen hari Odi bandadyA hussen 
hariya bhaktagaLindali durita bhaya namagillallA
    caraNam 3    karuNAkara shrIsha hussen garuDa vAhananemba hussen 
aritu bandenallalli purandara viTTalannalladillillA
